testcase.name: Validation of Checkbox Functionality
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Angular UI materials home page.............................passed When User accepts cookies...................................................passed And User navigates to components page.......................................passed Then User validates that components home page is displayed..................passed When User navigates to "Checkbox" component from left navigation bar........passed Then User validates that user landed on component with title "Checkbox".....passed When User clicks the "Check me" checkbox....................................passed Then User validates that "Check me" checkbox is selected....................passed When User clicks the "Indeterminate" checkbox...............................passed Then User validates that "Indeterminate" checkbox is selected...............passed When User clicks the "Check me" checkbox....................................passed Then User validates that "Check me" checkbox is not selected................passed When User clicks the "Indeterminate" checkbox...............................passed Then User validates that "Indeterminate" checkbox is not selected...........passed

testcase.name: Validation of Form Field Functionality
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Angular UI materials home page.............................passed When User accepts cookies...................................................passed And User navigates to components page.......................................passed Then User validates that components home page is displayed..................passed When User navigates to "Form field" component from left navigation bar......passed Then User validates that user landed on component with title "Form field"...passed When User enters text "Testing" in the input field..........................passed And User selects "Second option" from the dropdown..........................passed And User enters "UI Automation" in text area field..........................passed And User navigates to "api" tab.............................................passed Then User validates "api" page is displayed.................................passed And User navigates to "examples" tab........................................passed Then User validates "examples" page is displayed............................passed
